column2: Local search algorithms and test them on the Traveling Salesman Problem (TSP) between a few dozen US state capitals
Permutations: generate neighbors of the current path by selecting a starting point and an ending point in the current path and add all permutations
Initial path length for no of cities = 4 is 998.16
Initial path length for no of cities = 7 is 1918.58
Initial path length for no of cities = 12 is 3982.53
Initial path length for no of cities = 16 is 4842.21
